extendedInfo.description: Race against the clock! It sounds simple enough for a word game: You get 5 tries to guess a 5 letter word and weâll even give you the first letter. No problem, right? Well, youâd better be quick because the clock is ticking, and if you take too long...BOOM!Did you hear that? That was a Wordsplosion! â and the next one you hear might be your last!Performance-based hint system!Wordsplosion isnât easy (it wouldnât be much of a word game if it was), but if you keep a clear head and a steady hand youâll earn free letters to help you out when you get in a jam. And the more words you guess, the more hints youâll get!Huge DictionaryFrom Abyss to Zesty, if it is a five letter English word, youâll find it in Wordsplosion! We chucked out a few for being too hard (and a few more to keep it clean), but youâd be hard pressed to find a word we forgot about.How long can you go before the detonator blows? Itâs time to find out. Itâs time to play the fast-paced word game that always keeps you guessing: Wordsplosion!Game Features:â¢	Wordsplosive, rapid-fire word game action!â¢	Letter-ifically huge dictionary with thousands of possible words!â¢	Gorgeous graphics and bomb-tastic sound effects!â¢	Performance-based hint systemMore games from Concrete Software:PBA Bowling ChallengeAces SpadesAces Gin RummyAces Bubble PopperAces Traffic PackAces Jewel HuntAces Hearts

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Really addicting. But i would recommend that for the next update u guys gave us a skiping option for time\'s sake. But still a great app. Realy recommend it.
reviews.author: Fabio Tomaselli

reviews.title: Awesome game but....
reviews.comment: It really is an awesome and very addictive game and i love it to bits! However, if someone doesnt know a word even after hints and many trials, the game doesnt give you a chance to quit trying so that it gives you the word and you move to the next. Please include that option, other than that u did a great job!!!!
reviews.author: Precious Tawodzera

reviews.title: Mind Game!
reviews.comment: In the best sense of the word; got rid of all my other word games.  This one takes brains, memory, common sense, & at times, a sense of humor!  Just the right balance of what every word game should be.  A 10!
reviews.author: Michele Valdez

reviews.title: Jolly!!
reviews.comment: Great!  These words excel! Guess which combo works - grins ensue! ----- ----- ----- In this game, you guess a 5 letter word. The game provides the first letter only. You can guess the other letters and the system keeps track. It gets more and more fun as you keep playing. Words are simple to start with, but as you keep going, less common and more interesting words appear. This is a great game!
reviews.author: flash gordon md

reviews.title: Challenging
reviews.comment: I am hooked on word games and this app is quickly becoming one of my favorites. It\'s very challenging but more than one hint would be better, although it definitely adds to the challenge. Good job!
reviews.author: Tina Whited

reviews.title: Ruined by video ads
reviews.comment: Ads are one thing. 30-second unskippable video ads that eat both my bandwidth and my time? The game is fun, but not THAT fun.
reviews.author: Jamey Carter

reviews.title: 32 second ads in between turns? really??
reviews.comment: so there are your regular ads during the game and then every so often there are over 30 seconds of video that goes full screen. no thanks. besides that the game is fun besides the frustrating typing of words.
reviews.author: Graham Steffaniak

reviews.title: Wordsplosion
reviews.comment: This is a very good mind game. I love the fact that it gives clues so the player gets more excited. Please add more words of varying length or number of letters. Thanks.
reviews.author: Julie Quiazon

reviews.title: A great game challenge fir YOUR brain
reviews.comment: We have been having a blast trying guess words in the car....trying to play by  yourself keeps my mind fresh and its nice to learn the 5 letter words.  Didn\'t realize how diificult this was going to really be. Definitely didn\'t consider the fun factor lol. Love love love.
reviews.author: tiffanie campbell

reviews.title: Really? 30 second video adds!!?
reviews.comment: My score 95k!! Beat that!   Uninstalling due to the ridiculous amount of ads. Who wants to watch a video every 10 rounds.   The pop ups every 5 are enough!!
reviews.author: Tim Stafford

reviews.title: Silent
reviews.comment: I don\'t know if I\'m just being dim, but is there a way to mute the game? That would be nice :)
reviews.author: Hana Kahu

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great simple game that is addictive.  If u really want addictive for free try Doodle Jump Free and, much better game than both, Subway Surfers.
reviews.author: Safia Mahmood

reviews.title: Awesome !
reviews.comment: This game is really cool. It\'s addicting, works well, and is fun for the whole family. (:
reviews.author: Galy Galicia

reviews.title: Enjoying the Challenge
reviews.comment: I\'m enjoying developing my five letter words. I know this will help me me in my other word games that I play. Thank you. And I\'m only challenging MYSELF.
reviews.author: Dana LaFrance

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: Good game, challenging, nice way to waste time. I understand having ads in an app and I appreciate no push notifications. But, a 33 second video ad after every few words is too much for me. I am uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Allison Johnson

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Tests your flair with words..Nice way to spend your travel time. The game\'s graphics also engages the user to play more. UI design is top notch
reviews.author: Vignesh Prakasam

reviews.title: Gets tired really quick.
reviews.comment: Suspects that the algorithm in this game changes the words as the games progress, increasing the difficulty. In other words when the game starts it let\'s you win the words on very few tries.  After you score over 20000 points the, the game don\'t let you guess the words.
reviews.author: wilmark johnatty

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This game is challenging, but fun @ the same time. Working my brain. Lol 5 stars!
reviews.author: Stephanie Aina

reviews.title: Very fun game
reviews.comment: I had fun with this game for the few free lvls they give ya. Really makes ya think. I\'m not good at word games, but I did get a 6 in a row streak! Just wish it was free minus 1 star for paid.
reviews.author: Raime Egolinsky

reviews.title: Word Plosion
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Keeps the mind working. Very challenging.  I get started playing,  and hate to put it down.
reviews.author: LINDA KERN
